{{Actor| | type = Explosive | name = Maulotaur floor flame trail | class = MinotaurFX3 | game = Raven }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:MinotaurFX1|MinotaurFX1]]→[[Classes:MinotaurFX2|MinotaurFX2]]→MinotaurFX3
The flame trail left behind the [[Classes:MinotaurFX2|running flame]] from an impact on the ground from a [[Classes:Minotaur|maulotaur]]'s maul. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR MinotaurFX3 : {{Class|MinotaurFX2}} { {{Property|Radius}} 8 {{Property|Height}} 16 {{Property|Speed}} 0 {{Property|DeathSound}} "minotaur/fx3hit" {{Property|ExplosionDamage}} 128 States { Spawn: FX13 DC 4 Bright FX13 BCDE 5 Bright FX13 FGH 4 Bright Stop } }
